meanings.definition: (adjective) marked with irregular patterns of discoloration caused by fungi
meanings.sent1: The spalted wood had unique patterns of discoloration from the fungi.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used spalted maple to create a beautiful table.
meanings.sent3: The spalted tree looked like it had a secret code written on its trunk by the fungi.
meanings.sent4: The spalted design on the wood resembled a mysterious map leading to hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The spalted appearance of the wood made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: (verb) to become marked with irregular patterns of discoloration caused by fungi
meanings.sent1: Over time, the untreated wood began to spalt due to fungal growth.
meanings.sent2: If you leave the logs outside, they will spalt naturally.
meanings.sent3: The old fence spalted slowly, as if it was getting a fungal tattoo.
meanings.sent4: Neglecting the wood caused it to spalt like a canvas painted by nature.
meanings.sent5: The damp conditions in the shed made the wood spalt quickly.
